channel.title: Ammonia | Prof. Dr. Bradley P. Ladewig - Academic Website

item.title: H2-Global
item.description:
H2-Global focusses on electrochemical methods for green hydrogen production from a range of feedstocks. The project supports an extended scientific visit by Professor Manoj Neergat from IIT Bombay, working in Luxembourg for 12 months spread over a three year period.

Funding Acknowledgement

H2-Global is supported by the Luxembourg National Research Fund, Project 17548946, under the INTER Mobility programme.
